005package edu.wpi.first.hal.simulation;
006
007/** Interface for simulation buffer callbacks. */
008public interface BufferCallback {
009  /**
010   * Simulation buffer callback function.
011   *
012   * @param name Buffer name.
013   * @param buffer Buffer.
014   * @param count Buffer size.
015   */
016  void callback(String name, byte[] buffer, int count);
017}
